model.from sentence: According to the ablation results , we infer that : ( a ) When the number of layers is only one , the model lacks reasoning capability .

helps.from sentence: ( b ) Adding the reset gate helps .

hurts.from sentence: ( c ) Including vector gates hurts in 1 k datasets , as the model either overfits to the training data or converges to local minima .

vector gates.in: bAbI story - based QA 10 k dataset

sometimes help.from sentence: On the other hand , vector gates in bAbI story - based QA 10 k dataset sometimes help .
